what OS are you using? this wasnt a problem with me and i have windows 7 ultimate 64bit. have you tried uninstalling and trying again? make sure you have nothing else open during the instal and try putting your antivirus on silent or gaming mode. or disable it. sometimes it effects game installs.

I don't know where the Bin file is. It still says that I don't have a verified copy of the game...
How do I patch the game? Also, I don't have a readme folder.

the read me file should be in the downloaded torrent. also the bin folder is where you installed the game to. if you are using windows and kept it default then it should be in local disc C drive, then program files or program files x86. then you'll find the game in there. most likely under 'EA'.
to patch the game open up the launcher. not the game shortcut. it should have an EA thing that gives u options to play or to install downloads and stuff... open that and theree will be an area to patch. secondly. after you have patched it. then copy the 2 files in the crack folder and paste then into the games Bin Folder and hit replace. then the game is ready to play. so long as you dont patch it again
